scripts.build: pnpm build:core && pnpm build:popup && pnpm build:extension
scripts.package: pnpm build:core && pnpm build:popup && pnpm --filter extension package
scripts.launch: start-server-and-test "http-server apps/extension/tests/pages -p 5173 -c-1" http://localhost:5173/test-page.html "cd apps/extension/dist && web-ext run --browser-console --devtools --start-url http://localhost:5173/test-page.html"
scripts.docs:graph: pnpm depcruise packages/core apps/extension apps/popup-ui --include-only "src/" --output-type dot > docs/dependency-graph.dot && dot -Tsvg docs/dependency-graph.dot -o docs/dependency-graph.svg
scripts.docs:all: pnpm run docs:graph && pnpm run docs:typedoc
